usefulTips:
Useful Shortcuts:

 [[ - to add parts
 \\ - to add standard text
 {{ - to add visuals
selectElement: Select an element to view its visuals
selectElementForInstruction: Select an element to view its work instructions
leaveConfirmation: Do you want to save changes before leaving the editor?
selectElementForDetails: Select an element to view its details
removeStepConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove step:
